Package com.hakan.core.ui.anvil

Class HAnvil

java.lang.Object
com.hakan.core.ui.anvil.HAnvil
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUI
public abstract class HAnvil extends Object implements GUI
HAnvil is a class that handles Anvil GUI.
